SELECT sla.id, sla.name, sla.description, sj.jobs, du.username AS updater, sla.update_time FROM (SELECT * FROM dv_sla WHERE workspace_id = ${workspaceId}) sla LEFT JOIN ( )sj ON sla.id = sj.sla_id LEFT JOIN dv_user du ON sla.update_by = du.id
WHERE LOWER(sla.name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchVal})), '%')
SELECT sla.id, sla.name, sla.workspace_id, sla.description FROM dv_sla sla JOIN (SELECT sla_id FROM dv_sla_job WHERE job_id = ${jobId}) sj ON sla.id = sj.sla_id

select c.type, d.config, c.receiver from (select b.type, b.sender_id, b.config as receiver from (select sla_id from dv_sla_job where job_id = #{jobId}) a join dv_sla_notification b on a.sla_id = b.sla_id) c join dv_sla_sender d on c.sender_id = d.id
